scripts.build: pug src --out dist && sass src/assets/scss:dist/assets/css --style compressed --load-path=src && npm run build:js && npm run copy:assets
scripts.copy:assets: cp -r src/assets/img dist/assets/ 2>/dev/null || echo 'No images to copy' && cp -r src/assets/media dist/assets/ 2>/dev/null || echo 'No media to copy'
scripts.build:watch: pug src --out dist --watch & sass src/assets/scss:dist/assets/css --watch --style compressed --load-path=src
scripts.dev: npm run build && cd dist && python3 -m http.server 3000
